projects.name: Professor Research Emailer
projects.description: Developed an automated system to match professors' research with student interests

projects.name: Name Rater
projects.description: Built an application to rate names based on factors such as rarity and cultural significance, integrating external APIs for data collection. Designed and executed test cases to verify algorithm accuracy.

projects.name: Synonym Evaluator
projects.description: Developed a system to analyze word meanings using cosine similarity, ensuring precise semantic comparisons. Implemented extensive testing, logging, and debugging to improve accuracy by 10%.

experience.name: Wind Turbine Pitch Control
experience.description: Designed and implemented a pitch control system for a Nema 24 stepper motor to optimize wind turbine performance. Conducted thorough testing and debugging of hardware systems, resolving connectivity issues with SSH and PuTTY.

awards.name: UTRAHacks Hackathon
awards.description: Won 1st place prize in the closed competition out of 400+ hackers.

awards.name: Faculty of Applied Science and Engineering Award
awards.description: Awarded scholarship of $10,000 for academic merit.

awards.name: UTAPS Marion Choi Award
awards.description: Awarded bursary of $10,000 for academic merit.

awards.name: Avogadro Chemistry Exam Contest
awards.description: Placed in the top 250 of over 6000 competitors (96th percentile).
